thread.title: Jennifer Lopez to host 2015 American Music Awards
thread.title_full: Jennifer Lopez to host 2015 American Music Awards

title: Jennifer Lopez to host 2015 American Music Awards
text:
Jennifer Lopez to host 2015 American Music Awards Jennifer Lopez to host 2015 American Music Awards Share 
Jennifer Lopez is taking on hosting duties at next monthâ€™s American Music Awards. 
The singer and actress will host and perform at the November 22 show, to air live on ABC from the Microsoft Theatre in Los Angeles. From my first @TheAMAs nomination 15 years ago to HOSTING the 2015 #AMAs ! It's going down 11/22 on ABC!! #AMAsJLo ðŸ’– pic.twitter.com/GEpPguLoeW 
â€” Jennifer Lopez (@JLo) October 7, 2015 
This will be her first time hosting an awards show. Dick Clark Productions, who make the show, said the 46-year-old entertainer will also perform material from her upcoming Las Vegas residency at Planet Hollywood Resort and Casino. (Andy Kropa/Invision) 
Singers Joe Jonas and Charlie Puth are set to announce AMA nominees on October 13. Nominees are chosen based on album sales, radio airplay, touring and social media. Share article 
The show recognises artists with fan-voted awards in such categories as pop/rock, rap/hip-hop, country, Latin and adult contemporary. Promoted Stories
